si.title: හදිසි දැනුම්දීම ...
body_lines: කල්මුනායි අෂ්රෆ් අනුස්මරණ රෝහලට ගංවතුරෙන් ගංවතුරට ගොදුරු වී තිබේ.

en.title: Emergency Notification…
body_lines: Floods have been flooded into the Kalmunai Ashraf Memorial Hospital.

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the emergency notification in 200 characters:
"Kalmunai Ashraf Memorial Hospital flooded. Emergency services on site. Patients and staff evacuated. Cause of flooding under investigation."
